description: storm clouds and rain over water at right; figures with umbrellas rushing away from shore at center; several overturned and upright chairs at right; tent at left; flagpoles at center
inscription:
Date, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in the print: [Trouville 4 (illegible) 1874 / Tohule (?)]; on back, in pencil: [APC 15318] and illegible inscription
markings: LLQ, stamped in red: [F (owl) B]; on back, stamped in blue: [EB]
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until 1999; sold in October for ITOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1999-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: A Squall at Trouville
